TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This is a reusable expression which gets all the input values for the target table:ITEM. It defaults to ' ' or 0 when the inputs are null or contain spaces.The output fields passes the variables used.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_ITEM

MAPPLET.DESCRIPTION: Mapplet to get the ITEM_ID for different Manufacturing Items
MAPPLET.NAME: ML_ITEMID_MFG

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Output field ITEM_ID for manufacturing items from the Mapplet
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: OUT_ITEM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Expression to set default values for fields that are not applicable for a DIVISION_GROUP
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_ITEM

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(ISNULL($$DIVISION_GROUP) OR LENGTH(LTRIM(RTRIM($$DIVISION_GROUP))) = 0, ABORT('Parameter file for division_group not setup'), $$DIVISION_GROUP)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: V_DIVISION_GRP_PARAM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Lookup to get the ITEM_ID for different manufacturing items.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_ITEM

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT I.ITEM_ID as ITEM_ID, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'tts',NVL(I.ATTRIBUTION_CODE,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.ATTRIBUTION_CODE,' '),' ') as ATTRIBUTION_CODE, TRIM(I.DIVISION_GROUP) as DIVISION_GROUP, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'sls',NVL(I.SKU,' '),' ') AS SKU, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),'tts',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),' ') as STYLE_NUM, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slsp',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),'slu',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),'tts',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),' ') as COLOR_CODE, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),'tts',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),' ') as SIZE_CODE, ' ' AS CUP_SIZE, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.X_SIZE,' '),' ') as X_SIZE, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_POS,' '),' ') as SIZE_POS, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_LINE,' '),' ') as SIZE_LINE, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.PACK_CODE,' '),' ') as PACK_CODE, 'MFG' AS ITEM_TYPE_CODE, ' ' AS UPC_CODE, ' ' AS SAP_GRID_VALUE, ' ' AS SAP_MATERIAL_NUM, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'tts',NVL(I.CUT_WIDTH,0),'slsp',NVL(I.CUT_WIDTH,0),0) as CUT_WIDTH FROM ITEM I WHERE LOWER(TRIM(I.DIVISION_GROUP)) = LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')) AND I.ITEM_TYPE_CODE = 'MFG' AND I.ITEM_ID IN (SELECT MIN(I.ITEM_ID) FROM ITEM I WHERE LOWER(TRIM(I.DIVISION_GROUP)) = LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')) AND I.ITEM_TYPE_CODE = 'MFG' GROUP BY DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'tts',NVL(I.ATTRIBUTION_CODE,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.ATTRIBUTION_CODE,' '),' ') , TRIM(I.DIVISION_GROUP) , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'sls',NVL(I.SKU,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),'tts',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slsp',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),'slu',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),'tts',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),'tts',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.X_SIZE,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_POS,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_LINE,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.PACK_CODE,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'tts',NVL(I.CUT_WIDTH,0),'slsp',NVL(I.CUT_WIDTH,0),0))

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: ATTRIBUTION_CODE = I_ATTRIBUTION_CODE AND DIVISION_GROUP = I_DIVISION_GROUP AND SKU = I_SKU AND STYLE_NUM = I_STYLE_NUM AND COLOR_CODE = I_COLOR_CODE AND SIZE_CODE = I_SIZE_CODE AND CUP_SIZE = I_CUP_SIZE AND X_SIZE = I_X_SIZE AND SIZE_POS = I_SIZE_POS AND SIZE_LINE = I_SIZE_LINE AND PACK_CODE = I_PACK_CODE AND ITEM_TYPE_CODE = I_ITEM_TYPE_CODE AND UPC_CODE = I_UPC_CODE AND SAP_GRID_VALUE = I_SAP_GRID_VALUE AND SAP_MATERIAL_NUM = I_SAP_MATERIAL_NUM AND CUT_WIDTH = I_CUT_WIDTH

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Input fields to be looked up on the ITEM table to get ITEM_ID for different manufacturing items
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: IN_ITEM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Mapplet to get the ITEM_ID for different Manufacturing Items
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: ML_ITEMID_MFG

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Output field ITEM_ID for manufacturing items from the Mapplet
INSTANCE.NAME: OUT_ITEM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Expression to set default values for fields that are not applicable for a DIVISION_GROUP
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_ITEM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Lookup to get the ITEM_ID for different manufacturing items.
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_ITEM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Input fields to be looked up on the ITEM table to get ITEM_ID for different manufacturing items
INSTANCE.NAME: IN_ITEM

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping inserts the manufacturing related items into the item table.The SQ will be overriden at the session level.
MAPPING.NAME: m_ITEM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation filters the new records i.e for null item_ids
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: FIL_ITEM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This is a common logical view with no SQ query at mapping level. The view will be common for all SC BI Item creation mappings.The SQ will be overridden at the session level.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_LOGICAL_VW

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT LOGICAL_VW.APPLICATION_CD, LOGICAL_VW.PRODUCT_GRP_CD, LOGICAL_VW.DIVISION_GROUP, LOGICAL_VW.ITEM_TYPE, LOGICAL_VW.STYLE_NUM, LOGICAL_VW.COLOR_CODE, LOGICAL_VW.SIZE_CODE, LOGICAL_VW.SIZE_CODE, LOGICAL_VW.PACK_CODE, LOGICAL_VW.X_SIZE, LOGICAL_VW.SIZE_LINE, LOGICAL_VW.SIZE_POS, LOGICAL_VW.SKU, LOGICAL_VW.CUT_WIDTH, LOGICAL_VW.ATTRIBUTION_CODE, LOGICAL_VW.UPC_CODE, LOGICAL_VW.CUP_SIZE, LOGICAL_VW.SAP_GRID_VALUE, LOGICAL_VW.SAP_MATERIAL_NUM, LOGICAL_VW.UPDATE_USERID FROM LOGICAL_VW where ROWNUM<3

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Mapplet to get the ITEM_ID for different Manufacturing Items
INSTANCE.NAME: ML_ITEMID_MFG

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This is a reusable expression which gets all the input values for the target table:ITEM. It defaults to ' ' or 0 when the inputs are null or contain spaces.The output fields passes the variables used.
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_ITEM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation filters the new records i.e for null item_ids
INSTANCE.NAME: FIL_ITEM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This is a common logical view with no SQ query at mapping level. The view will be common for all SC BI Item creation mappings.The SQ will be overridden at the session level.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_LOGICAL_VW

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Stored procedure used to generate new item_id
INSTANCE.NAME: PR_ITEM_ID_NEXTVAL

METADATAEXTENSION.NAME: CONV_MAP_NAME
METADATAEXTENSION.VALUE: 08/26/2009:difranci:SCPBI - Conversion Mapping - Item Creation Logic v_1.0.xls.xls

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
Save session log for these runs
Session Log File Max Time Period

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This session loads new item_ids in item table from STAGING.STG_UW_WIP_ICP0100 and STAGING.STG_UW_WIP_ICP0130 for Knitting in Process.
SESSION.NAME: s_m_ITEM_KNIT

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
SELECT distinct
'TTS' AS APPLICATION_CODE,
'GS' AS PRODUCT_GROUP_CODE,
'tts' AS DIVISION_GROUP,
'MFG' AS ITEM_TYPE,
GREIGE_STYLE||CYL_SIZE AS STYLE_NUM,
GREIGE_COLOR AS COLOR_CODE,
CYL_SIZE||'0' AS LKP_SIZE_CODE,
CYL_SIZE||'0' AS TGT_SIZE_CODE,
' ' AS PACK_CODE,
' ' AS X_SIZE,
' ' AS SIZE_LINE,
' 'AS SIZE_POS,
' ' AS SKU,
0 AS CUT_WIDTH,
' ' AS ATTRIBUTION_CODE,
' ' AS UPC_CODE,
' ' AS CUP_SIZE,
' ' AS SAP_GRID_VALUE,
' ' AS SAP_MATERIAL_NUM,
'ETL_SCBI_ITM_TTS_GS_212' as UPDATE_USERID
FROM STG_UW_WIP_ICP0130 WHERE ROLL_STATUS = 15 AND PROCESSED_FLAG = 'N'

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Save session log for these runs
Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: This workflow runs sessions to load new item_ids in item table from STAGING.STG_UW_WIP_ICP0100 and STAGING.STG_UW_WIP_ICP0130 for Knitting in Process.
WORKFLOW.NAME: wf_s_m_ITEM_KNIT
